def transform(sequence):
    transformed = ''
    for i in range(len(sequence)-1):
        diff = abs(int(sequence[i]) - int(sequence[i+1]))
        transformed += str(min(9, diff))
    transformed += sequence[-1]
    return transformed

def transform(sequence):
    transformed = ''
    for i in range(len(sequence)-1):
        diff = abs(int(sequence[i]) - int(sequence[i+1]))
        transformed += str(min(9, diff))
    transformed += sequence[-1]
    return transformed
